original_title: มือปราบ 2 แผ่นดิน
overview: Thai action film starring Sorapong Chatree.  The Thai title is "มือปราบ 2 แผ่นดิน", not to be confused with "มือปราบสองแผ่นดิน", which is another film altogether.  They are often mistaken for one another, but this film uses the numeral "2", rather than "two".
title: Mue Prab 2 Paen Din
